author: SudanTribune
title: Umma party religious leader urges unity amid division over Tagadum membership
text:
Editor's Picks
Umma party religious leader urges unity amid division over Tagadum membership
June 1, 2024 (CAIRO) – Amid growing internal divisions within the National Umma Party over participation in the Coordinating Council of Democratic Civil Forces “Tagadum”, Abdel Mahmoud Abu, Secretary-General of the party’s religious wing, the Ansar Affairs Authority, has issued a series of recommendations aimed at preventing a split.
In a statement, Abu urged party leaders to “close the gaps that deepen disagreements” and view recent events as a “practice exercise for democracy.” He called for reconciliation and a renewed focus on activating the party’s institutions, ensuring members are informed and involved in decision-making.
The dispute centres on the party’s involvement in Tagadum. The Presidency and Coordinating Council favour participation, while the party leader and General Secretariat oppose it. The disagreement has escalated into a public exchange of statements.
Abu emphasized the need for a consultative approach, respecting the mandates of party leaders while keeping institutions informed. He also recommended assigning tasks to specialized cadres to assist institutions in fulfilling their roles, especially given that their mandates have been extended due to unforeseen circumstances.
Internal strife within the party intensified following last week’s inaugural conference of the Tagadum coalition. A group of National Umma Party leaders, calling themselves the “Institutional Reform” group, held a press conference in Port Sudan, criticizing Tagadum and the acting party leader, a key figure in the coalition.
The rebellious group condemns the coalition for its alleged backing of the Rapid Support Forces.
Acknowledging these signs of division, party figure Zeinab al-Sadiq Al-Mahdi revealed in an interview with Sudan Tribune that differing positions among party leaders have become increasingly apparent.
Acting party leader Fadlallah Burma Nasir deemed the press conference “unconstitutional” and in violation of the party’s constitution and political line. He vowed to hold the participants accountable through party disciplinary procedures.

author: world today news
title: A. Pirinska: On the plenary session of the Nationwide Meeting of the BSP on 17.11.2019, it was mentioned: “We should cleanse ourselves, comrades. If he would not prefer it, let him go.” – 2024-06-27 17:44:10
text:
/ world as we speak information/ “For greater than three years now, we now have witnessed how the principle efforts of the get together management are aimed toward eradicating and discrediting all those that disagree with the model and strategies of administration.”
This was said by Ana Pirinska, a member of the Nationwide Meeting of the BSP, in an interview with “Studio Banker”. And he recalled that on the plenum of the left on November 17 of this yr the phrases had been sounded: “We should purify ourselves, comrades. Who doesn’t wish to go.” “Because of this coverage and the so-called left-wing conservatism, which locks the get together right into a nationalist area of interest, the management turns the BSP right into a handy opposition that maintains the established order,” Pirinska claims. That is fairly clearly evident from the cut up and the conduct of the parliamentary group of the BSP in current days and weeks. In line with Pirinska, “till the voters are satisfied that the BSP is a contemporary, open, accountable and progressive get together, we won’t win the belief of the bulk so as to have the ability to handle and uphold the ideas of the welfare state enshrined within the Structure of Bulgaria and of democratic socialism , as dictated by the Social gathering Program”./VIDEO/

author: Cecy Del Carmen
title: Spring with a winter feel
text:
Spring with a winter feel
Bone-chilling wind chills this morning!!! Winds are not impressive and they continue to weaken. With that said, they will continue to influence the feels-like temperatures. Bundle up, it’ll continue to be cold through the morning. Sunny skies prevail on this Friday. Clouds increase tonight ahead of frontal system that promises unsettled weather after midnight through tomorrow night. At the onset of this storm we could see snow, little to no accumulation is expected. The changeover will take place soon after to an all-rain event that could lead to 2-3 inches of rain, possible flooding, flood watch has been issued and go into effect Saturday morning through Sunday morning. Potential for flooding along the Pawtuxet and Wood River. The wind will pick up, gusting up to 35-40 mph. Heaviest rainfall is expected Saturday afternoon through midnight. Sunday features sun, temperature in the low 40s, remains gusty. Below average temperatures through Tuesday with partial sunshine. Rain moves in Tuesday night into Thursday.

author: Светлана Л 149
title: DeepSeek отложила выпуск новой модели из-за проблем с китайскими чипами
text:
Китайская компания DeepSeek, специализирующаяся на разработке ИИ, отложила выпуск новой модели из-за проблем с обучением на чипах Huawei. Как отмечает Financial Times, это демонстрирует ограниченность возможностей Китая по замещению американских технологий.
В январе китайские власти рекомендовали DeepSeek использовать процессоры Huawei Ascend вместо продуктов Nvidia. Однако, по данным источников FT, компания столкнулась с техническими сложностями при обучении модели R2 на этих чипах. В результате разработчикам пришлось использовать чипы Nvidia для обучения, а на этапе использования готовой модели для генерации ответов прибегнуть к решениям от Huawei. Обучить ИИ-модель на чипах Ascend не удалось, даже несмотря на участие команды инженеров Huawei. При этом, как отмечают источники, работа по обеспечению совместимости модели с этими процессорами продолжается.
Сложности DeepSeek демонстрируют отставание китайских чипов от американских аналогов в решении ключевых задач. Как сообщают отраслевые эксперты, китайские процессоры уступают продуктам Nvidia по стабильности работы, скорости межчипового соединения и качеству программного обеспечения.
О том, что власти Китая рекомендуют местным компаниям воздержаться от использования процессоров H20 производства Nvidia, ранее сообщал Bloomberg. По данным агентства, в письмах компаниям были заданы вопросы о необходимости приобретения чипов Nvidia при условии наличия китайских аналогов, а также о возможных проблемах с безопасностью.

author: Mariano Huguet
title: “Me gustaría…”: Advíncula se animó y compartió cómo sería su jugada soñada en choque ante River
text:
Luis Advíncula concedió una conferencia de prensa de cara al Superclásico entre Boca y River a disputarse el sábado 21 a partir de las 16.00 hrs en La Bombonera por la fecha 14 de la Liga Profesional de Fútbol . El peruano estuvo acompañado por Paulo Díaz . Ambos respondieron varias preguntas.
Llegado a un momento fueron consultados sobre cómo sería su jugada soñada. El defensor de Boca expresó estas palabras: “ Me gustaría dar una asistencia, en el último minuto y ganar 1-0 ”. Un dato no menor es que una derrota podría dejar a Diego Martínez al borde del abismo. Por lo que es fundamental que el Xeneize se imponga al Millonario.
Martínez tiene solo una duda: jugar con cinco defensores o con cuatro. En caso de apostar por un 5-3-2 el DT presentará a la siguiente formación: Sergio Romero; Luis Advíncula, Cristian Lema, Aaron Anselmino, Marcos Rojo, Lautaro Blanco; Cristian Medina, Pol Fernández, Kevin Zenón; Miguel Merentiel y Edinson Cavani.
Mientras que en un 4-4-2 el entrenador buscaría la victoria con la siguiente formación: Sergio Romero; Luis Advíncula, Cristian Lema, Marcos Rojo, Lautaro Blanco; Cristian Medina, Pol Fernández, Kevin Zenón, Ignacio Miramón; Miguel Merentiel y Edinson Cavani.
Más de Advíncula Por otro lado el jugador del Club de la Ribera expresó estas sensaciones: “ Todo el mundo quiere jugar un clásico, más en casa, son muchísimo más especiales ”. Además agregó lo siguiente: “Es hermoso y hay que tener garra y huevo porque es el clásico rival. Tenemos que quedarnos con los 3 puntos”.
También hizo referencia a su lesión: “ Cada vez estoy mejor. Es una lesión que la verdad no pensé que se me iba a complicar tanto. Estoy mejor, con muchas ganas ”. No debería descartarse que Advíncula no complete los 90 minutos. Juan Barinaga será su reemplazante.
Finalmente, fue consultado por la recientemente implementada ‘zona de capitanes’: “ Me mataste, ni sabía que había eso. No tenía ni idea. Yo trato de hablarle lo más mínimo a los árbitros. Siempre me caractericé por eso, si van los capitanes mejor ”.
